name: Source Beauty B.V.
description: Operator of a beauty e-commerce platform intended to provide the best skincare, makeup, fragrances, and health products in the market. The company's platform seeks out the best skincare and makeup products and acts as a hub of information, enabling users to make well-informed and cost-saving purchases.
one_liner: Operator of a beauty e-commerce platform intended to provide the best skincare, makeup, fragrances, and health products in the market. The company's platform seeks out the best skincare and makeup products and acts as a hub of information, enabling users to make well-informed and cost-saving purchases.
